import React, {useState} from 'react'; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const scrollUp = document.querySelector(".scrollup"); // when the scroll is higher than 560 viewport height, add the show-scroll class to a tag with the scroll-top class if(this.scrollY >= 560) scrollUp.classList.add ("show-scroll"); else scrollUp.classList.remove("show-scroll"); }); /*===================Toggle Menu=======================*/ const[Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const[activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("#home"); return (
Sunny Prakash
  • setActiveNav("#home")} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav_link"}> Home
  • setActiveNav("#about")} className={activeNav === "#" ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav_link"}> About

showMenu(!Toggle)}>
showMenu(!Toggle)}>
) } export default Header
